sentence.Network_en: Prices are exorbitantly high in the capital.
sentence.Network_cn: 首都的物价高得不可思议.

sentence.Network_en: In some countries, prices are exorbitantly high which are ten as much as that in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些国家的物价水平高,大概是中国国内的十倍.

list.abs: omit dispassionately 不带偏见地删掉omit exorbitantly 极其过分地删掉omit freely 随意地删掉

entry.def: If you describe something such as a price or fee as exorbitant, you are emphasizing that it is much greater than it should be.

example.ex: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
example.tran: 过高的房价已经造成了穷人能够买得起的住房严重短缺。

sentences.sentence: "prices are exorbitantly high in the capital"

auth_sentence.content: So this exorbitantly specicidal and persistently genocidal creature has empathy?
auth_sentence.res_content: So this exorbitantly specicidal and persistently genocidal creature has empathy?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So this exorbitantly specicidal and persistently genocidal creature has empathy?

auth_sentence.content: We are sitting in the shadow of an exorbitantly beautiful, ownerless Picasso.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are sitting in the shadow of an exorbitantly beautiful, ownerless Picasso.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are sitting in the shadow of an exorbitantly beautiful, ownerless Picasso.
